articles.description: Tom Curry is set to win the competitive race to be the British and Irish Lions  open-side flanker ahead of Jac Morgan, with Sione Tuipulotu featuring in an all-Scotland midfield.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: Tom Curry and Sione Tuipulotu set to start first Test

articles.description: R&A officials meet US President Donald Trump's son Eric to discuss The Open returning to Turnberry - but say logistical challenges remain.
articles.title: R&A meet Donald Trump's son about Open returning to Turnberry but say 'logistical issues' remain

articles.description: Bath centre Max Ojomoh is one of three uncapped players in England's starting XV to take on the United States in Washington DC on Saturday.
articles.title: United States v England: Max Ojomoh starts as Immanuel Feyi-Waboso returns

articles.description: Liverpool have spent more than £170m on players this summer and are rumoured to be interested in Newcastle striker Alexander Isak.
articles.title: Alexander Isak: How can Liverpool afford Newcastle striker?

articles.description: Former Australian motorcycle gang member and prisoner Ryan Peake speaks about his unlikely journey to the Open Championship at Royal Portrush.
articles.title: The Open 2025: The ex-bike gang member competing at Royal Portrush

articles.description: England face India in the first ODI at Utilita Bowl - follow live scores, radio commentary, video highlights and updates.
articles.title: England vs India LIVE: First women's ODI, Southampton - cricket score, commentary, highlights & updates

articles.description: BBC Sport explores the issues around slow over-rates during the England-India Test series and looks at possible solutions.
articles.title: England vs India: How to solve Test cricket's slow over-rate problem

articles.description: Queenberry chief Frank Warren says Tyson Fury will not make a boxing comeback this year but he wants to fight Oleksandr Usyk again.
articles.title: Tyson Fury: Frank Warren says heavyweight wants to fight Oleksandr Usyk next year

articles.description: Sweden captain Kosovare Asllani says they "don't fear" England as the teams prepare to meet in the Euro 2025 quarter-finals on Thursday.
articles.title: Sweden 'don't fear' England in Euro 2025, says Kosovare Asllani

articles.description: Major champions JJ Spaun, Justin Rose and Padraig Harrington respond to Scottie Scheffler's existential comments about the meaning of golf on the eve of The Open.
articles.title: The Open 2025: Major champions weigh in on Scottie Scheffler's 'what's the point' soliloquy
